FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class ElementHitInfo

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Elements
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Unified hit test result for all canvas elements. Used for standardized tagging of controls and hit test payloads across both visual-tree and direct-rendering modes.

public sealed class ElementHitInfo
Inheritance
object
ElementHitInfo
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)

Remarks

This replaces disparate tagging approaches: - Control.Tag = Node - Control.Tag = Edge - Control.Tag = (Node, Port, bool)

With a single unified payload that supports all element types and handles.

Optional handle identifier (e.g., "resize", "rotate"). Null if the main element was hit.
